name: iotabii
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpg(s0, wceq(cio(s0, w0), cio(s0, w1)), wb(w0, w1))
stmt.pretty: mpg(s0, iota(s0, w0)= iota(s0, w1), (w0 ↔ w1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cio(s0, w0), cio(s0, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wceq(cio(s0, w0), cio(s0, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)
body.pretty:
⊢ iota(s0, w0)= iota(s0, w1)
⊣ (∀(s0,(w0 ↔ w1))→ iota(s0, w0)= iota(s0, w1))
⊣ (w0 ↔ w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cio(s0, w0), cio(s0, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wceq(cio(s0, w0), cio(s0, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ iota(s0, w0)= iota(s0, w1)
⊣ (∀(s0,(w0 ↔ w1))→ iota(s0, w0)= iota(s0, w1))
⊣ (w0 ↔ w1)

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wceq(cio(s0, w0), cio(s0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:

-| wb(w0, w1)
